detail_desc: Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves,a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative flatlock seams.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a viscose and cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front to the waist, a yoke with a pleat at the back and open chest pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves with a tab and D-rings, and a seam at the waist with elastication at the sides and detachable tie belt. Diagonal side pockets, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Unlined.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Long, cable-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a wide rib-knit polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in jersey with a sheen. The top has short, wide butterfly sleeves.

Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Imitation suede trainers with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.
Metal ear cuffs in various designs, two decorated with glass rhinestones and two with plastic beads.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Fitted, strapless dress in sturdy, textured jersey containing glittery threads with a concealed silicone trim at the top.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with an open section at the front and a V-neck with a tie detail. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a small frilled collar, an opening with ties at the back of the neck and elasticated cuffs with a flounced trim.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with an opening and button at the back of the neck, lace yoke and short sleeves.
Jersey-lined trousers in narrow-wale organic cotton corduroy with covered elastication at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a flock print on the front.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with an inner sweatband and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Cardigan in rib-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with a small frilled collar and V-shaped opening with ties at the front. Short raglan sleeves with a flounced trim, and a gathered seam at the hem for added width. Lined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Metal studs and ear cuffs in various designs. One snake-shaped stud with a cuff at one end. The zinc in the metal is recycled.

Playsuit in woven fabric with a decorative pompom trim and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated waist and short legs with a lace trim.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Bomber jacket in a nylon weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a double pocket on one sleeve, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with embroidered decorations and a slightly lower neckline.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered appliqué on the chest, long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Handbag in imitation leather with a zip and two adjustable handles at the top.Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Size 14x27x32 cm.
Knee-length skirt in sequin-embroidered mesh with wide elasticated ribbing at the waist. Jersey lining.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, pile-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbed cuffs.

Dress in airy dobby-weave cotton with buttons and embroidery at the top and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam and a decorative bow at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Padded ski jacket in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and narrow shoulder straps that join at the back to form a decorative pattern.
Low-rise, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with front and back pockets, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted maxi dress in ribbed jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a halterneck and high slits in the sides.
Trousers in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and back pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow sides with knot details and medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in soft pile with a hood with sewn-on ears, a zip down the front and side pockets in the shape of paws. Unlined.
Large scarf in an airy, patterned weave with a frayed, raw-edge hem. Size 158x210 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and slits in the sides.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces around the neckline that continue down the front. Yoke at the back with gathers to provide extra width, and long sleeves with a pleat and buttons at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with matt plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in plumeti chiffon with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Jersey lining.
Fitted, lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and extra long sleeves with thumbholes.
Bracelets in various styles with wooden and plastic beads.
Trousers in cotton seersucker with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch pockets at the sides and narrow elastication at the hems.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.

Jacket woven in a cotton blend with a collar and drawstring hood with a foldover edge and small peak. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and long raglan sleeves. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and a flap sleeve pocket, all with hook and loop fastenings, an adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, heart-shaped front pockets, regular back pockets and narrow hems.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with short sleeves and an opening at the back with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and wide legs. Unlined.
Wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Short skirt in a stretch jacquard knit with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Short skirt in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey.
